name: @dubizzle/cz-conventional-changelog-for-any
description: Commitizen adapter following the conventional-changelog format, forked from https://github.com/digitalroute/cz-conventional-changelog-for-jira.

scripts.add-dependencies: npm install boxen@5 chalk commitizen lodash.map longest right-pad word-wrap && npm install -D @types/chai @types/mocha chai cosmiconfig cz-conventional-changelog mocha mock-require prettier semantic-release semver
scripts.remove-dependencies: npm uninstall boxen chalk commitizen lodash.map longest right-pad word-wrap && npm uninstall @types/chai @types/mocha chai cosmiconfig cz-conventional-changelog mocha mock-require prettier semantic-release semver

author: Marcus Johansson <polarn@gmail.com>
